items.name: Starlight Chalice
explicitMods: Inflict Fire, Cold and Lightning Exposure on nearby Enemies when used
27% increased Effect of Non-Damaging Ailments you inflict during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: Uhtred and his priests drank of the skies

items.name: Oblivion Remnant
explicitMods: 4% chance to receive additional Divination Card items when opening a Reward Chest in a Heist
7% chance in Heists for Orbs of Alteration to drop as Chaos Orbs instead
6% chance in Heists for Orbs of Augmentation to drop as Chaos Orbs instead
items.descrText: You must find the sculpture The Catch in a Smuggler's Den or Underbelly Blueprint to be able to equip this

items.typeLine: Startled Divine Life Flask of Sealing
explicitMods: Instant Recovery when on Low Life

Grants Immunity to Bleeding for 6 seconds if used while Bleeding
Grants Immunity to Corrupted Blood for 6 seconds if used while affected by Corrupted Blood
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Lion's Roar
explicitMods: Knocks Back Enemies in an Area when you use a Flask
75% chance to cause Enemies to Flee on use
Adds Knockback to Melee Attacks during Effect
10% more Melee Physical Damage during effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: A sprinkle of hunger, a spoonful of menace
and three generous cups of Might.

items.name: Cinderswallow Urn
explicitMods: Recharges 5 Charges when you Consume an Ignited corpse
Regenerate 3% of Life per second during Effect
Enemies Ignited by you during Effect take 8% increased Damage
Recover 3% of Life when you Kill an Enemy during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: A controlled burn is sometimes necessary for new life.
